verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
King of Glory I surrender,
King of Heaven my voice I lift to You.
Let my worship be pleasing unto You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My desire is to worship,
all I long for is to touch your heart.
Let my worship be pleasing unto you.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
/// There is no one else like You ///
O Lord!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
// King of Kings,
Lord of all Lords
I exalt Your Name on high
as I draw closer
to Your Great Throne
Glorify Your Name //
